        public static java.lang.String javaJreHome()
        Returns JRE home.

      • javaHome

        public static java.lang.String javaHome()
        Returns JAVA_HOME which is not equals to "java.home" property since it points to JAVA_HOME/jre folder.

      • tempDir

        public static java.lang.String tempDir()
        Returns system temp dir.

      • osName

        public static java.lang.String osName()
        Returns OS name.

      • osVersion

        public static java.lang.String osVersion()
        Returns OS version.

      • javaVersion

        public static java.lang.String javaVersion()
        Returns Java version string, as specified in system property. Returned string contain major version, minor version and revision.
        See Also:
        javaSpecificationVersion()

      • javaSpecificationVersion

        public static java.lang.String javaSpecificationVersion()
        Retrieves the version of the currently running JVM.

      • javaVersionNumber

        public static int javaVersionNumber()
        Returns detected java version. Returned number is a number 10x the major.minor, e.g. Java1.5 returns 15.

      • javaVendor

        public static java.lang.String javaVendor()
        Returns Java vendor.

      • isAtLeastJavaVersion

        public static boolean isAtLeastJavaVersion(int version)
        Checks if the currently running JVM is at least compliant with provided JDK version.
        Parameters:
        version - java version multiplied by 10, e.g. 1.5 is 15

      • isJavaVersion

        public static boolean isJavaVersion(int version)
        Checks if the currently running JVM is equal to provided version.
        Parameters:
        version - java version, multiplied by 10, e.g. 1.5 is 15.
